sample_extract_protocol_ch1: Single nuclei isolation was performed on the heart tissue aliquots as described in Litvinukova et al. 2020 (PMID:  32971526), with some modifications. Single heart aliquots were kept on dry ice until being transferred into a precooled 2 mL dounce homogenizer (Sigma) with 2 mL homogenization buffer (250 mM sucrose, 25 mM KCl, 5 mM MgCl2, 10 mM Tris-HCl, 1 mM dithiothreitol (DTT), 1x protease inhibitor, 0.4 U/µl, RNaseIn, 0.2 U/µl SUPERaseIn, 0.1% Triton X-100 in nuclease-free water). Samples were ...
sample_data_processing: FastQ files were individually processed using an in-house scRNA-seq pipeline dropRunner. Briefly, dropRunner utilizes FastQC to obtain quality control metrics followed by fast and efficient alignment to human reference genome hg38 using STARsolo 2.6.197 in GeneFull mode with other parameters set to default. STARsolo performs alignment and quantification of gene expression in one package., We quantified expression at the gene level using Gencode v29 gene annotations utilizing both intronic and ex ...
supplementary_files_format_and_content: Tab-separated values files and matrix files

sample_extract_protocol_ch1: scATAC-seq libraries were prepared according to v1 of the manufacturer’s guidelines for the Chromium Next GEM Single Cell ATAC Reagent Kits (10X Genomics), with the modification that we started from nuclei that were isolated. Between 9,300 and 25,000 nuclei were tagmented using Transposition Mix (10X Genomics) at 37°C for 1 h and loaded on the Chromium controller. We targeted between 6,000 and 10,000 nuclei for library preparation. QC was performed on final ATAC-seq libraries using a Qubit Fluor ...
sample_data_processing: FastQ files from 12 sequencing experiments were individually processed using 10x Genomics CellRanger-atac 1.2.0101. We used the command cellranger-atac count to align the fastq files to human reference genome hg38, followed by marking and removing duplicate reads, and producing a fragment file containing the mapped location of each unique fragment in each nucleus.
supplementary_files_format_and_content: Tab-separated values files and matrix files
